name: Thai Alphabet Game F: Remake v.2.0+
name_original: Thai Alphabet Game F: Remake v.2.0+
description:
"FREE VERSION of Thai Alphabet Game"

The best way to start learning a language is by grasping the language’s basics. Similarly, Thai Alphabet Game F guides you through the recognition, writing, definition, and pronunciation of all Thai consonants. No matter how less your knowledge in The Thai language is, you will find it easy to learn and master the 44 consonants and 10 numbers while identifying standard letters by listening to their pronunciations.

Learning Thai language is not boring anymore since you are going to learn by playing games with Thai alphabets and numbers while listening to cheerful sound and music to encourage your learning.
To start learning Thai language, it's necessary to know Thai letters to see how they look, how to write, how to pronounce and meaning of each alphabet.

This app is intended for the beginners such as kids and foreigners who want to learn Thai language. In the app, you will learn and practice writing Thai scripts. There are 44 consonants and 10 numbers to practice. You can listen to the voice showing how to pronounce each alphabet and number.

In order to let you memorize all letters and meaning, there are 10 mini games to train you.

*** Enjoyable ways to learn Thai alphabets!

Features included in this app:

  • Alphabet list right before playing tracing game. You can browse through all alphabets and numbers to be familiar with meaning and pronunciation. There are 44 consonants and 10 numbers to learn.
  • Learn how to write Thai alphabets by tracing your finger along the outline. Don't worry if you don't know where to start, it has a tracing hint. Once completed, you will hear how to pronounce along with a picture showing its meaning. It also has English words showing how pronounce. 
    • Added feature: Alphabet tracing with exploding oranges. Hit the monsters to get score points.
  • Pairing the alphabets with images with 5 mini games will help you quickly remember meaning of each alphabet.
  • Test your memory with invading monster flying down from sky.
  • Alphabet searching. How fast can you find all of them while octopus moving around?
  • Jumping bunny. Cute and fun with your control skill.
  • 15 Slide puzzles to reveal various boards of alphabet related images.
  • Matching games with both open and close cards
  • Rewarded items to help you in the games with more joy.

Download and enjoy playing now.
